response.comment:
Excellent experience : as a first home buyer, I found in MariaStella not only an 'agent' but an Advisor, a Supporting and Patient Professional guide that would explain everything along the way .

Reliable and Knowledgeable, always following up, she was able to translate my expressed and unexpressed needs so that I found exactly my perfect place . She was on the top of everything, from the search to the showings to the paperwork  to the last minute of the closing process.
I will always thank Maria Stella for all the Guide, Support, Professionalism, Advices and Patience with my search and purchase!

I loved working with Maria to find the perfect apartment that met all my needs. I was a first time renter of a co-op and she made the process very seamless. She was always available for questions and worked diligently to submit the material in a timely manner. Very friendly and knowledgable, highly recommend! Thank you Maria!

Maria-Stella is truly the best of the best! A friend recommended her services to me and I emailed her right after. She was immediately responsive and we began working together on budgets, locations, and potential purchases. She is incredibly understanding and listens to her clients. She pays attention to detail and gave us many options to choose from before we visited final listings. 

Maria-Stella is very punctual and arrived early or on-time to every listing. She observed and analyzed each listing with us, like she was purchasing it for herself. She even went above and beyond to look under rugs to make sure the flooring was not damaged!

She is easily accessible and communicates well with her clients. She responded to my emails within the hour and to my texts! But besides Maria-Stella’s professionalism, one of her best qualities is her kindness. She truly wants you to find the right home! She spent a lot of time listening to our concerns, asking questions, making sure we were taking the right steps, especially as first time home owners. Now that we’ve closed on our first home, I can truly say that Maria-Stella has transitioned from our broker, to our friend. It was an absolute pleasure to work with her and get to know her. We feel blessed to have worked with such an incredible broker who made us feel like family and helped us find our home. You’re the best Maria-Stella!

Maria-Stella is the agent for you if you want a tireless, enthusiastic, knowledgable and friendly partner in one of the biggest decisions you will ever make. I truly felt she was on my side and left no stone unturned to make sure my interests were being protected. Maria-Stella is a powerful ally in New York's complicated and often frustrating New York landscape - one you will need! Could not recommend her more highly. With her help, I am now moving into my dream apartment in Manhattan.
